thread.title: Fintech could help small firm finance but there are risks
thread.title_full: Fintech could help small firm finance but there are risks

author: Financial News
title: Fintech could help small firm finance but there are risks
text:
Follow @annairrera 26 October 2015 Fintech offers “tremendous” potential for cash-starved small and medium enterprises and the global economy, but risks such as the limited protection of retail investors and the partial lack of regulation need to be taken into account, according to the World Economic Forum.
